main event: A person reported seeing an unidentified object in the sky over Cheviot, Ohio on April 29, 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared to move up and down, disappear and then reappear briefly. Smaller portions seemed to be attached to or separate from the main object.
The object had a greenish glow and was estimated to be moving at a speed of approximately 1,800 mph.
The observer estimated the object was slightly more than a mile away.
The object was observed for about 3 minutes and was seen both in front of and behind clouds.
The observer described the object as having an irregular shape with indistinct edges and appendages, but no distinct features like wings or trails.
sighted object: Irregularly shaped object with greenish glow
